ST.xhtml:p:
BIT_OF_DWORD := (SHR(in,N) AND 16#00000001) > 0;
(* From Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function extracts a single bit from the nth position from right (right is lowest bit the lowest Bit (Bit0 from in) is selected with N=.

ST.xhtml:p:
_BYTE_TO_INT := USINT_TO_INT(BYTE_TO_USINT(IN));
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: BIT_COUNT counts the amount True of bits in a dword.
this function loads a bit into a byte at position pos.
this function loads N bits of D at pos P in Byte I
this function loads a bit into a DWord at position pos
this function loads N bits of D at pos P in DWORD I
this function loads a bit into a Word at position pos
this function loads N bits of D at pos P in WORD I

ST.xhtml:p:
BIT_TOGGLE_B := SHL(BYTE#1, POS) XOR IN;
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function toggles a bit of a BYTE at position pos.

ST.xhtml:p:
BIT_TOGGLE_DW := SHL(DWORD#1, POS) XOR IN;
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function toggles a bit of a WORD at position pos.

ST.xhtml:p:
BIT_TOGGLE_W := SHL(WORD#1, POS) XOR IN;
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function toggles a bit of a WORD at position pos.

ST.xhtml:p:
Byte_of_bit := SHL(SHL(SHL(SHL(SHL(SHL(SHL(BOOL_TO_BYTE(B7),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B6),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B5),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B4),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B3),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B2),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B1),1) OR BOOL_TO_BYTE(B0);
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function creates a byte from 8 individual bits

ST.xhtml:p:
BYTE_OF_DWORD := DWORD_TO_BYTE(SHR(in,_BYTE_TO_INT(SHL(n,3))));
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function extracts a single byte from the nth position from right

ST.xhtml:p:
B0 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),0); (* IN.X0 *) B1 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),1); (* IN.X1 *) B2 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),2); (* IN.X2 *) B3 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),3); (* IN.X3 *) B4 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),4); (* IN.X4 *) B5 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),5); (* IN.X5 *) B6 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),6); (* IN.X6 *) B7 := BIT_OF_DWORD(BYTE_TO_DWORD(IN),7); (* IN.X7 *)
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this Function Block extracts the 8 Bits from a byte

ST.xhtml:p:
BYTE_TO_GRAY := IN XOR SHR(IN,1);
(*From OSCAT Library, www.oscat.de*)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function converts a binary to gray code
this function checks for an even partity for a dword and partity bit
CRC_GEN generates a CRC checksum from a block of data
This function reverses the specified amount of bits from bit 0 to bit n within a dword while L specifies the amount of Bits to be reflected
This function reverses the bits of a byte so that after execution bit 7 is at bit 0 location and so forth
a bit input will be decoded to the two outputs Q0 or Q1 dependent on the value of A
a bit input will be decoded to one of the 4 outputs dependent on the Adress on A0 and A1
a bit input will be decoded to one of the 8 outputs dependent on the Adress on A0, A1 and A2

ST.xhtml:p:
DWORD_OF_BYTE := SHL(SHL(SHL(BYTE_TO_DWORD(B3),8) OR BYTE_TO_DWORD(B2),8) OR BYTE_TO_DWORD(B1),8) OR BYTE_TO_DWORD(B0);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function creates a Dword from 4 individual bytes

ST.xhtml:p:
DWORD_OF_WORD := SHL(WORD_TO_DWORD(W1),16) OR WORD_TO_DWORD(W0);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function creates a Dword from 2 individual Words
this function converts a gray code into binary

ST.xhtml:p:
INT_TO_BCDC := SHL(INT_TO_BYTE(IN / INT#10),4) OR INT_TO_BYTE(in MOD INT#10);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function converts an integer into a two digit bcd number
MATRIX is a matrix keyboard encoder for 4 rows and up to 5 columns

ST.xhtml:p:
MUX_2 := SEL(A0, D0, D1);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: dual input multiplexer
quad input multiplexer
this function calculates the even parity of an input Dword

ST.xhtml:p:
SHL1 := SHR(DWORD#16#FF_FF_FF_FF,32-N) OR SHL(IN,N);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: SHL1 shifts N bits to the left filling the new bits with 1

ST.xhtml:p:
SHR1 := SHL(DWORD#16#FF_FF_FF_FF,32-N) OR SHR(IN,N);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: SHR1 shifts N bits to the right filling the new bits with 1

ST.xhtml:p:
Swap_Byte := ROL(in,8);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: This function swaps the high and low byte of the word in

ST.xhtml:p:
Swap_Byte2 := (ROR(in,8) AND DWORD#16#FF00FF00) OR (ROL(in,8) AND DWORD#16#00FF00FF);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: This function reverses the byte order in the dword.

ST.xhtml:p:
WORD_OF_BYTE := SHL(BYTE_TO_WORD(B1),8) OR BYTE_TO_WORD(B0);
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function creates a word from 2 individual bytes

ST.xhtml:p:
WORD_OF_DWORD := DWORD_TO_WORD(SHR(in,_BYTE_TO_INT(SHL(n,4))));
(* Fromm Oscat Library, www.oscat.de *)

documentation.xhtml:p: this function extracts a single word from the nth position from right
